org.jLOAF.performance

Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jLOAF.performance.Statistics

  • public class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates statistics for testing performance of imitating agents
    Since:
    2017
    Author:
    sachagunaratne

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Statistics(Agent agent)
      Creates a statistics object with an agent, and initializes a confusion matrix

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Agent getAgent()
      returns the agent on which the evaluation is done
      float getClassificationAccuracy()
      Used to get the current classification accuracy of the Agent
      float getF1(java.lang.String action)
      Used to get the current f1-measure of the Agent for a specific type of action.
      float getGlobalF1()
      Used to get the current global f1-measure of the Agent.
      float getPrecision(java.lang.String action)
      Used to get the current recall of the Agent for a specific type of action.
      float getRecall(java.lang.String action)
      Used to get the current recall of the Agent for a specific type of action.
      StatisticsBundle getStatisticsBundle()
      Returns all of the statistics as a StatisticsBundle.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> getStatisticsHashMap()
      Returns all the performance measures inside a HashMap
      void predictedCorrectActionName(Case input)
      Takes a case as an input, the agent predicts an action and then the correct and predicted actions are added to the confusion matrix
